name: Screw Them - Post Jam Version
description:
Post-Jam Version:

We added some post-processing effects to improve our visuals and key symbols for each action to the UI.

Screw them is a "Hack 'n'  Slay" game where you play a robot who's planet is invaded by evil cows. 

Because of our time limit and some problems, we didn't manage to create a storyline. There are two red-eyed bulls in the west and in the north- east and in the south are cow-hydras. You have to kill all the cows to save your planet. To get bigger and stronger you have to disassemble your friends. 

Game mechanics:

left mouse:                       click to move

right mouse:                    whirlwind attack

Shift + left mouse:       straight shot

E:                                            disassemble your friends to upgrade yourself
